name: Factory Flip
description:
Every night the abandoned factory springs to life.  Hazard bells screech, gears clank as they turn, and a single drone is given the chance to make its escape.  Can you guide it to freedom?

Factory Flip is an experiment in making a game that only needs one button to be played, and in making a mobile game using Unreal Engine 4.  It is also the first game where all of the programming was done by myself.  If you’re interested in some of the other projects I’ve worked on you can click on my Linktree to see more (https://linktr.ee/DouglasRysdyk). 

Features:
- Wonderful graphics by Bailey Hart — https://twitter.com/hunie_cherry

- See how far you get, and then beat that score!  

- Press space to flip between the ceiling and the floor!  

- Dodge obstacles no matter their speed!

- Don’t miss the green shield!

Finally if you enjoy it at all then a dollar would go a long way.  Thank you and enjoy!
